ygData.subject: Re: Soul Fire
ygData.msgSnippet: Well I heard the best weapon in the game is a paladin only weapon.  Why?  I dunno. Qanin The Rathe ... From: Azor [mailto:jmaynus@netphase.net] Sent: Thursday,
ygData.messageBody:
Well I heard the best weapon in the game is a paladin only weapon. Why? I
dunno.

Qanin
The Rathe


-----Original Message-----
From: Azor [mailto:jmaynus@...]
Sent: Thursday, July 08, 1999 2:56 PM
To: EQ-Clerics@onelist.com
Subject: [EQ-Clerics] Soul Fire


From: "Azor" <jmaynus@...>

I just heard about this new Paladin only sword, Soul Fire. Why does it seem
like Paladin's and other classes get weapons thats made just for that class
and Cleric's does not have anything like that? If they do I've never heard
of them, but it would be nice to have a mace or hammer thats made just for
us Cleric's or even armor made just for us. What does everyone think about
that?

**************************
Azor
Lvl 16 Human Cleric of the Rathe
**************************
